key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: antialiasing
key.description: The type of antialiasing to use when rendering fonts. Possible values are: "none" for no antialiasing, "grayscale" for standard grayscale antialiasing, and "rgba" for subpixel antialiasing (LCD screens only).

key.name: hinting
key.description: The type of hinting to use when rendering fonts. Possible values are: "none" for no hinting, "slight" for basic, "medium" for moderate, and "full" for maximum hinting (may cause distortion of letter forms).

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: rgba-order
key.description: The order of subpixel elements on an LCD screen; only used when antialiasing is set to "rgba". Possible values are: "rgb" for red on left (most common), "bgr" for blue on left, "vrgb" for red on top, "vbgr" for red on bottom.

key.name: disabled-gtk-modules
key.summary: List of explicitly disabled GTK+ modules
key.description: A list of strings representing the GTK+ modules that will not be loaded, even if enabled by default in their configuration.

key.name: enabled-gtk-modules
key.summary: List of explicitly enabled GTK+ modules
key.description: A list of strings representing the GTK+ modules that will be loaded, usually in addition to conditional and forcibly disabled ones.

key.name: overrides
key.summary: A dictionary of XSETTINGS to override
key.description: This dictionary maps XSETTINGS names to overrides values. The values must be either strings, signed int32s or (in the case of colors), 4-tuples of uint16 (red, green, blue, alpha; 65535 is fully opaque).
